summary: A dungeon that is a work in progress. Includes a new Dungeon outside Riverwood and a unique weapon.
descriptionHtml:
I recently decided to begin contributing to the Nexus community, and this is my first piece.

It\'s a simple dungeon created using the Creation Kit wiki tutorial on level design. I am going to tie in a quest soon, and expand the dungeon.

You\'ll find the unique weapon in the back of the dungeon, protected by a mage. (Expert Lockpicking Required)
There is a cave area with no enemies, however, you\'ll notice a doorway blocked by stones.

You\'ll have to wait and see what the rest of the dungeon holds :)

Please comment with bugs + glitches + suggestions, and I will do my best to get out version 1.0!

Thanks for any support you guys might give me to create the next part of the dungeon (quest included)

~ halex1316
author: Howl
